name: Genetic Algorithm Examples
description:
Hello, this is an example project that I have put together after learning all of these methods from a class that I enrolled into. This game is a small example of three small projects all utilizing Genetic Algorithms. Please play each scene and have fun with the interactive projects. 

How to use the first example: 

  • Click on the shapes with the color that you desire Last
  • Each generation the Algorithm will create a new population and these will be closer to the size and color that you want.

How to use the second and third examples:

  • Once these scenes are loaded you can use the slider in the top left corner to modify the population size (50 by default)
  • then you can click the set population button to set the population amount you desire
  • Next there are buttons that will take you back to the main menu and the next project.
  • You can also reset the project and switch how it creates each population. 
  • The first is sorting by time alive. 
  • the next is by distance. this will make the AI more apt to run forward down the path.

Thank you for reading and taking the time to play this example! Please leave a comment below and visit my main page! Hope you all enjoyed and stay safe! 

- The Griffin Initiative
